Class Obstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphObject
      • javax.media.j3d.Node
        • javax.media.j3d.Leaf
          • javax.media.j3d.Shape3D
            • shapes.Obstacle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collidable, Drawable

    public class Obstacle
extends javax.media.j3d.Shape3D
implements Collidable, Drawable
    This class represents the "rocks" the Snowball is not supposed to collide with.
    Version:
    05.16.2016
    Author:
    Michelle Z. and Waveley Q.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Obstacle

        public Obstacle(float x,
                float y,
                float z,
                float width,
                float height,
                float depth)
        Creates an Obstacles with bottom-left-closest to viewer-corner coordinates at x, y, z, and dimensions width, height, depth.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z coordinate
        width - the width of the obstacle
        height - the height of the obstacle
        depth - the depth of the obstacle

        Draws the obstacle as a rectangular prism.

        Parameters:
